description_short: Jyeshtha Devi (Kali wife), Varuni (Sesha wife), Sauparni (Garuda wife), Apsaras, Gandharvas, Airavata, Ucchaisrava, Dhanvantari, Parijatam, Kamadhenu born from Milk ocean
Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden. Involves planting Damanaka trees.
Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden.
Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden.
Hanuman born from Kaikeyi part of Payasam taken by Vulture and eaten by Anjana Devi
Daanam of Varaha Puran

shlokas:
citraguptaM mahAprAjJyaM lEkhanIpatradhAriNam .
citraratnAmbaradharaM madhyasthaM sarvadEhinAm ..

description_short: Daanam of Dadhyodanam, Vyanjanam, Chatram, Paduka, Udaka Kumbham, Mangos, Jackfruit; Lakshmi Narayana Pooja; Gouri Pooja;
Goddess Raja Matangi is 9th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Perform Samudra Snanam and Shraddha
Nandana year
Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day
Ganga came out of Jahnu Maharshi and became Jahnavi; perform Parjanya Pooja
Worship Surya Bhagavan in a vessel (`kumbha`) filled with sugar, followed by `dAnam` of the same.
shlokas:
zarkarAsaptamI caiva vAjimEdhaphalapradA.
sarvaduHkhaprazamanI sarvasampatpradAyinI..

description_short: Adi Shankara founded Govardhan mutt, Puri in Nala year Padmapadacharya as first
Monday Swati?
Danam of Brahma puranam
Adi Shankara founded Kamakoti Mutt, Kanchi in Siddharthi year with himself as first

Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.
shlokas:
balaM rUpaM yazO dharmaM jJAnamAyuH sukhaM dhRtim .
ArOgyaM paramApnOti samyak snAnEna mAnavaH ..

description_short: Avataram of `nArada muni`; perform danam of `vINA`, music
Perform Krishna Pooja
Perform puja of `karavIra` plants/flowers and then offer them in `arcanA`.
shlokas:
karavIra viSAvAsa namastE bhAnuvallabha.
maulimaNDana durgAdi dEvAnAM satataM priya

description_short: Rambha Vratam; perform Savitri pooja near Banana tree. Offer naivedyam of bananas prepared with ghee.
shlokas:
puSpamaNDapikA kAryA rambhAstambhOpazObhitA.
tatra sampUjayEddEvIM zaktyA svarNAdinirmitAm ..

vEdESu sarvazAstrESu divi bhUmau rasAtalE.
zrutO dRSTazca bahuzO na zaktyA rahitaH zivaH.
tvaM zakstistvaM svadhA svAhA tvaM sAvitrI sarasvatI.
patiM dEhi sutAndEhi gRhaM dEvi namO'stu tE..

 yOSitaH puruSO vA'pi khyAtaM rambhAvrataM bhuvi.
bhAryAM putraM gRhaM bhOgAn kulavRddhimavApnuyuH..

description_short: Perform puja of Uma-Maheshvara, on the day of Uma Devi's Avataram.
shlokas:
jyESThazuklacaturthyAM tu jAtA pUrvamumA satI.
tasmAt sA tatra sampUjyA strIbhiH saubhAgyavRddhayE..

description_short: Perform puja of Shiva-Parvati under a banana tree or on a banana leaf, do naivedyam of 100+ bananas and give away to small girl children.
shlokas:
putrAn dEhi dhanaM dEhi saubhAgyaM sarvamaGgalE.
saumaGgalyaM sukhaM jJAnaM dEhi mE zivasundari..

description_short: `brahmANI` is one of the seven `mAtRkA`s
Avataranam of Ganga Devi. Bathe in any river and offer arghyam â€” destroys 10 types of sins (`dazaharA`).
shlokas:
dazamyAM zuklapakSE tu jyESThE mAsE kujE dinE.
gaGgA'vatIrNA hastarkSE sarvapApaharA smRtA..

yAM kAJcit saritaM prApya dadyAdarghyaM zubhOdakam .
mucyatE dazabhiH pApaiH sa mahApAtakOpamaiH..
titles: Ganga Jayanti; Dashapaapa-hara-dashami; Wednesday; Hasta star (Valmiki Ramayana)

description_short: Perform puja of Lord Trivikrama (Sahasranamarchana), do naivedyam of mangoes and offer annadanam to needy.
shlokas:
ahOrAtrENa dvAdazyAM jyESThE mAsi trivikramam .
gavAmayanamApnOti apsarObhizca mOdatE..

description_short: Perform puja of banyan tree; begets `saumaGgalyam` and `saubhAgyam`.
Danam of Padma Puranam
Mitra rupa Surya Pooja
Do danam of leafy vegetables (but do not consume, on this day)
Do danam of curd (but do not consume, on this day)
Perform puja of Mahalakshmi-Mahavishnu
shlokas:
gOpadmamiti vikhyAtaM sarvapApaharaM param .
sarvaduHkhOpazamanaM sarvasampatpradAyakam .
suvAsinyAstu saubhAgyaputrapautrapravardhanam ..

vAsudEva zucau mAsE zAkavratamanuttamam.
tvatprItyarthaM kariSyE'haM nirvighnaM kuru mAdhava..

vAsudEva namastubhyaM prathamE mAsi matkRtam.
zAkavrataM mayA tEna saMtuSTO bhava mAdhava..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..
saGkarSaNAravindAkSa kariSyE'haM dadhivratam. dvitIyE mAsi dEvEza nirvighnaM kuru mE prabhO..

saGkarSaNa namastubhyaM zravaNE matkRtEna ca.
 dadhivratEna dEvEza tuSTO bhava janArdana..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

pradyumna tava tuSTyarthaM prOSTapadyAM tRtIyakE.
nirvighnaM kuru dEvEza kariSyE'haM payOvratam..
zrIpradyumna namastubhyaM mAsamArabhya yatkRtam. iSTadO bhava sarvEza gRhItvA tu payOvratam.. idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO. nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

aniruddha surairvandya dvidalavratamuttamam.
karOmyahamiSEmAsE nirvighnaM kuru mE prabhO..

aniruddha namastubhyaM dvidalAkhyavratEna ca. matkRtEnAzvinE mAsE prItyarthaM phaladO bhava..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

description_short: Chaaturmasya begins; 4 months; Pradakshina to Pippala; Deeparadhana in temple; Saraswati Pooja; 1st month no vegetables; 2nd month no curds; 3rd month no milk; 4th month no dals;
Puja of Veda Vyasa / Gurus; Danam of Vishnu Puran is good on this day.
shlokas: acaturvadanO brahmA dvibAhuraparO hariH. aphAlalOcanO zambhurbhagavAn bAdArAyaNaH..

description_short: Pooja of Kokila for getting good husband/wife.

Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.
Lord Mahavishnu sleeps with Goddess Mahalakshmi on this day. Do Puja by placing the God/Goddess on a new bed with pillow/blanket. Do danam of same after puja.
shlokas:
lakSmyA viyujyatE dEva na kadAcit yatO bhavAn .
tathA kalatrasambandhO dEva mA mE viyujyatAm ..

description_short: Perform puja of Ganapati with `dUrvA` grass

* Day Garuda brought Amrutam for Nagas
* Day Garuda and Takshaka fought and compromise was struck with Takshaka as garland in Garuda's neck (peace treaty :)

shlokas:
apasarpa sarpa bhadraM tE dUraM gaccha mahAyazAH .
janamEjayasya yajJAntE astIkavacanaM smaran ..

description_short: Lord Hayagriva did upadesham of all four vedas to Brahma.
shlokas:
OGkArOdgItharUpAya RgyajussAmamUrtayE.
namO'studEvadEvAya vAcchitArthapradAyinE..
ajJAnatimiraM chindhi jJAnaM ca''zu prayaccha mE.
dEhi mE dEva dEvEza hayazIrSa namO'stu tE..

description_short: World Sanskrit Day is celebrated on this day.

shlokas:
pujyAya rAghavEndrAya satyadharmaratAya ca.
bhajatAM kalavRkSAya namatAM kAmadhEnavE..

description_short: VaakuduChettu Puja
Naga (Manasa) Puja

Goddess Mahakali is 1st of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

shlokas:
jitaM jitaM tE'jita yajJabhAvana trayIM tanuM svAM paridhunvatE namaH.
yadrOmagartESu nililyuraddhayastasmai namaH kAraNasUkarAya tE..3-13-35..
—zrImadbhAgavatE mahApurANE tRtIyEskandhE trayOdazE'dhyAyE

description_short: Puja of Gauri-Maheshwara on Vrishabham, esp. for girls desirous of getting married, like Goddess Parvati sought the hand of Maheshwara, as Himavan's daughter.
Perform puja of Surya, eat Panchagavya -- brings merits greater than Ashvamedha!
shlokas:
zuklE bhAdrapadE SaSThyAM snAnaM bhAskarapUjanam .
 prAzanaM paJcagavyasya azvamEdhaphalAdhikam ..

Do `pUjA` *of* `dUrva`!
Durga Puja
Durga Puja
7 days bath in Vitasta river tributary of Narmada
Wednesday Shravana ; Vamana Jayanti; Shravana Dvadashi; Vijaya Dvadashi; Shakra Dvadashi

udyadinadyutimindukirITAm tuGgakucAM nayanatrayayuktAM 
smEramukhIM varadAGkuzapAzAbhItikarAm prabhajE bhuvanEzIm

Puja of Ananta Padmanabha.

Do `pUjA` of Lalita Devi.
Spend this day in Badarikashramam

prabhAkara namastubhyaM saMsArAnmAM samuddhara.
 bhuktimuktipradO yasmAt tasmAcchAntiM prayaccha mE..

description_short: Jeemuutavahana is an atma-tyagi vidyadhara Chakravarti. Saved Shankhachuda's (Naaga) life by offering himself to Garuda. From that day Garuda stopped eating snakes.
Perform `snAnam` at `maNikarNikA` ghat in Varanasi.
Lord Krishna killed Kamsa on this day; most popularly celebrated in Mathura and Uttar Pradesh.
In honour of Sumangalis (in the family), by holding a feast for Suvasinis and Kanyas.
shlokas:
bharturagrE mRtA nArI sahadAhEna vA mRtA .
 tasyAH sthAnE niyuJjIta vipraiH saha suvAsinIm ..

description_short: Perform Samudra Snanam and Shraddha.
Grandson must seek blessings of his maternal grandparents, and bestow gifts.

Arjuna wins over all Kauravas and Karna. Worship of all weapons, or rather, tools related to one's profession.
Jayanti of Madhvacharya, a proponent of Dvaita Vedanta
Dussehra (Raama wins over Ravana)
According to Agni/Padma Puranam
`kUSmANDa` Danam
Have to play Aksha kreeda only on this day and Ko-jagarti-Vratam (Lakshmi will ask "who are awake"). Vaalakhilya Rushi mentioned Ko-jagarti Vratam
shlokas:
nizIthE varadA lakSmIH kO jAgartIti bhASiNI.
tasmai vittaM prayacchAmi akSaiH krIDAM karOti yaH..

description_short: Kunti-vratam done today will remove all paapams (including Gohatya). As per Bhavishyottara Puraana. Here Kunti means Parvati. Also, some people worship Yudhisthira's mother Kunti. In AP/TEL, eldest child is given new clothes, harti and blessed "Deerghayushman".
Attla-Taddi (Telugu). After moonrise, Uma devi pooja; From this day to Deepaavali eat more Urad dal
In North India, for progeny
Bhava year
In Gujarat
Dhanvantari Jayanti (born as Divodaas King of Kaashi) as per Brahmanda-Puraana (Dvadashi?)
Dhan-trayodashi in Gujarat; Lakshmi pooja
Do `dAnaM` of `dIpam`, light deepam outside the house.
shlokas:
AzvinasyAsitE pakSE trayOdazyAM nizAmukhE.
yamadIpaM bahirdadyAt apamRtyurvinazyati..

mRtyunA pAzadaNDAbhyAM kAlEna zyAmayA saha.
trayOdazyAM dIpadAnAt sUryajaH prIyatAM mama..

description_short:
*ShriKrishna killed Muraasura and Narakaasura on this day.
*Must do Taila-abhyangana-snaanam in early morning before sunrise, else Narakam (as per PadmaPurana) . If done, equal to GangaSnanam and avoids YamaYaatanam. Use water stored from previous day. Previous day night do pooja to water. Use this water on Chaturdashi. With plough uproot Upaamaarga-vruksham (small one) and put in the water. (DO NOT PLUCK WITH HAND). Do dhyaanam of Seeta.
* As per KalikaPuranam, Naraka was also upraised by Janaka. He was then sent to PraajyotishaPuram.
Perform Tarpana to Yamadharmaraja (even those with father). `jIvatpitA'pi kurvIta tarpaNaM yamabhISmayoH`
Perform Deepa Danam for Yamadharmaraja in evening
Gives light even to Naraka-vasis; Also, Bali was sent to Paatalam on this day.
Commemoration of Govardhana Leela of Krishna. Offer naivedyam to Lord Krishna.
Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day
Perform Samudra Snanam and Shraddha.
In Plava Nama year Adi Shankara obtained permission from mother and took manasika sanyasam

Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

mUrtitrayasvarUpAya dattAtrEya namO'stu tE..

description_short: Paramahamsa described Him as "walking Shiva of Varanasi"
Have darshan of Shivalingam today; removes Shivapachara doshas in the family.
shlokas:
mArgazIrSE'malE pakSE SaSThyAM vArEM'zumAlinaH .
zatatArAgatE candrE liGgaM syAddRSTigOcaram .

description_short: Birth of Surya to Aditya-Kashyapa on this day.
shlokas:
adityAM kazyapAjjajJE mitrO nAma divAkaraH.
saptamyAM tEna sA khyAtA lOkE'smin mitrasaptamI..

description_short: Adi Shankara founded Jyotir Mutt, Badarinath in Rakshasa year Totakacharya as first
Adi Shankara founded Sharada Mutt, Shringeri in Pingala year Sureshwaracharya as first
Do `dAnam` of salt, `sundararUpatvasiddhyartham`!

shlokas:
kAmakrOdhAdirahitaM rAmabhaktazirOmaNim .
tyAgarAjaguruM vandE saGgItAbdhiM kalAnidhim ..

description_short: Vanadurga Navaratri. Specially celebrated in Karthiramangalam.
Shyamala Devi specially blesses musicians; honour musicians in this period.

shlokas:
mAghazuklacaturthyAM tu kundapuSpaiH sadAzivam .
sampUjya yO hi naktA''zI samprApnOti zriyaM naraH ..

description_short: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day.
Afternoon Shri Raama started to go to the forests/exile.
Worship Mahavishnu and Mahalakshmi, Rati Devi and Manmatha with jasmine flowers.
shlokas:
mAghamAsE nRpazrESTha zuklAyAM paJcamItithau.
ratikAmau tu sampUjya kartavyaH sumahOtsavaH..

description_short: Saraswati Puja, especially in Bengal.
Adi Shankara founded Dwaraka Mutt in Sadharana year with HastamalakaAcharya as first
Bhishma obtained mukti on this day; offer tarpana to Bhishma (even those with parents). Brings health, long life and harmony in family.
Vanadurga Navaratri. Specially celebrated in Karthiramangalam.
Brahmaikyam of Madhvacharya
Mahavishnu created black til by extreme `tapas` on this day; light til deepam and offer `tilAnnam naivedyam`.
shlokas:
mAghE tu zukladvAdazyAM yatO hi bhagavAn pura.
tilAn utpAdayAmAsa tapaH kRtvA sudAruNam ..
tilatailEna dIpAzcha dEyAh dEva gRhESu ca.
nivEdayEt tilAnEva

description_short: Goddess Lalita is 3rd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.
Perform Samudra Snanam and Shraddha

Brahma Kalpadi
All related events e.g. kAmadahanam

description_short: Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.
Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.

Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.
Aradhana Day of Sri Anantarama Dikshitar.

id: kAJcI jagadguru zrI candrazEkharEndra sarasvatI jayantI

description_short: Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples.
Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples. Birth of Subrahmanya Swami. Worship Him with red flowers.

shlokas:
zrIviSNucitta-kulakalpakanandavallIm
zrIraGgarAja-hari-candana-yOga-drzyAm .
sAkSAt kSamAM karuNayA kamalAmivAnyAM
gOdAm ananyazaraNaH zaraNaM prapadyE..

id: kAJcI jagadguru zrI jayEndra sarasvatI jayantI

description_short: Visit Chidambaram to have darshan of Nataraja, or pray to Nataraja
shlokas:
kRpAsamudram sumukhaM trinEtraM sadAzivaM rudramanantarUpam .
jaTAdharaM pArvativAmabhAgaM cidambarEzaM hRdi bhAvayAmi ..

description_short: Poonthanam, a great devotee of Guruvayurappan, enriched Malayalam devotional literature with his renowned poetic composition 'Jnanapana', a philosophical work of all times. On this day, recital of Poonthanam's works and debate takes place. A one week literary festival is conducted at Poonthanam illam.

shlokas:
karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .
zrIzESAdriguruM vandE brahmIbhUtaM tapOnidhim ..

karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .

id: kAJcI jagadguru zrI zaGkara vijayEndra sarasvatI jayantI

description_short: Offer naivedyam of citrAnnam
Enactment of restoration of eyesight of Shukracharya.
Conduct veda parayanam in the evening, on one of these 48 days.
Offer naivedyam of `citrAnnam` (tamarind rice) to Vishnu
Offer naivedyam of `gudAnnam` to Vishnu, as mentioned in the Tiruppavai 27
Celebration of completion of Narayaniyam (762 CE), in Guruvayur temple.
Offer naivedyam of `dadhyodanam` to Vishnu, for Tiruppavai 28
Darshan of Makara Jyoti in Sabarimala Ayyappa Temple.
Perform danam of clothes, food and water.
shlokas: vastrAnnapAnadAnAni mithunE vihitAni tu..

description_short: Perform danam of ghee, milk vessel, "ghee cow" and fruits.
shlokas:
ghRtaM ca kSIrakumbhazca ghRtadhEnu phalAni ca.
zrAvaNE zrIdharaprItyai dAtavyAni vipazcitA..

description_short: Perform danam of clothes/place to live.
shlokas: kanyApravEzE vastrANAM vEzmanAM dAnamEva ca

description_short: Perform danam of rice/wheat/grains and cow ghee/curd etc.
shlokas: tulApravEzE dhAnyAnAM gOrasAnAmapISTadam

description_short: Do danam of deepam.
Perform danam of clothes/vehicle (e.g. bullock cart).
shlokas: dhanuHpravEzE vastrANAM yAnAnAM ca mahAphalam

description_short: Perform danam of hay, grass, food and pure water to cows.
shlokas: kumbhapravEzE dAnaM tu gavaM ambu tRNasya ca

description_short: VasudevaPooja, ChandraArghya, Naktam

Perform Vishnu Pratima Danam, Sridhara Puja
Offer coconut to sea God Varuna
Rakshabandhanam

shlokas:
mAdhavE mESagE bhAnau murArE madhusUdana.
prAtaH snAnEna mE nAtha phaladO bhava pApahan ..

description_short: Thiruvisanallur Sridhara Aiyyaval brought Ganga to his house well on this day! See also http://www.sriayyaval.org/ .
shlokas:
IzE tasya ca nAmani pravimalaM jJAnaM tayOrUrjitam
prEma prEma ca tatparESu viratizcAnyatra sarvatra ca.
IzEkSA karuNA ca yasya niyatA vRttiH zritasyApi yam
taM vandE nararUpamantakaripuM zrIvEGkaTEzaM gurum..

description_short: Satyanarayana Swami Jayanti is celebrated in Annavaram Satya Narayana Temple, Andhra Pradesh
Goddess Bagalamukhi is 8th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Goddess Dhumavati is 7th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Goddess Chinnmasta is 6th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Goddess Tripura Bhairavi is 5th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Goddess Mahatara is 2nd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
Goddess Kamala is 10th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
